metadata.name: MARICHKO
metadata.description:
This art is about our history as Ukrainians, about the strength of our ancestors, about our present and our future.

«MARICHKO» is my digital art collaboration with Ukrainian artist Kate Zhovta (instagram @zhovta_k). Kate is one of the nation's DNA repeaters in her drawings. 

Sound - Ukrainian music group «Patsykizfraneka»

50% оf sell will go to Ukrainian children affected by the war with Russia
